item.title: NortonLifeLock Inc 10-K
item.description: NortonLifeLock Inc, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 21, 2021 had 28968 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 308 instances million - 287 instances 2 - 240 instances 2020 - 237 instances april - 236 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
